description:
The Worldwide VAT Calculator application is an easy way to calculate your VAT (Value Added Tax / Sales Tax). It's simple to use and makes your Value Added Tax / Sales Tax Calculations much easier and faster than using a calculator, especially reverse VAT calculations. The application provides you with the standard rates for each country and also enables you to enter custom VAT amounts.  Everything is catered for in one simple, easy to use screen.

Application supports VAT, Sales Tax, TAX, TVA, IVA, GST, PVA etc for the following countries: 
Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Madeira and Azores, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Canary Islands, Sweden, United Kingdom, Albania, Argentina, Armenia, Australia, Belarus, Barbados, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Brazil, Bolivia, Canada, Chile, Columbia, Peoples Republic of China, Croatia, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Egypt, El Salvador, Fiji, Georgia, Guatemala, Guyana, Iran, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Israel, Japan, South Korea, Jersey, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kosovo, Lebanon, Morocco, Moldova, Macedonia, Malaysia, Mexico, Montenegro, Mauritius, New Zealand, Norway, Pakistan, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Russia, Serbia, Singapore, South Africa, Sri Lanka, Switzerland, Thailand, Trinidad and Tobago, Turkey, Ukraine, Uruguay, Vietnam, and Venezuela.
